text: Ernest Eddie Kirkup (born 1929), is a male former athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the marathon at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==Personal life== He was a member of the Rotherham Harriers. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:English male marathon runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Eddie Kirkup
